author: James Joyce
text: Dear Miss Weaver: I sent the eighth episode of Ulysses (Eolus) to Mr Pound some days [ago] and hope you have it now. If you have occasion to write to my New York publisher will you please thank him for the interesting controversial cuttings from American press about Ulysses and ask him to convey my thanks to Mr Hecht for his article in defense of the book?
